comments:

we get the following exception for a sun  cts test case.

PResourceFactoryRegistry incompatible with org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.common.internal.impl.J2EEResourceFactoryRegistry.

verified on wtp 1.0 RC1.  However the fix exposed
another problem with alt Deployment descriptors. opened 119051 to 
track it.
